span.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合可支援標準的以零為起始索引。This collection supports standard zero-based indexing. 屬性所提供類別會傳回。The property provided by the class returns a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 處理資料表的資料列群組，透過資料列群組屬性](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-row-groups-through-the-rowgroups-property.md)。For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Row Groups through the RowGroups Property](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-row-groups-through-the-rowgroups-property.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

span.span: Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 此集合的項目容量預先配置的集合。

span.span: The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is **8**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的預先配置位置儲存在集合中，項目數目，而屬性表示的目前集合中的項目實際數目。The property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 值一律為最小的值一樣大。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 當新加入的集合項目造成集合計數超過集合的容量，容量會自動增加以容納新加入的集合項目。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加集合容量包括配置額外的集合的位置，而造成效能與記憶體額外負荷。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用最佳化集合中的容量集合項目總計或最大數目事先知道的情況下的屬性。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用方法，讓集合能力 equalized 與目前的集合計數。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.

exception.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

summary.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來為集合的記憶體負擔降至最低，特別是當集合中所包含的項目組必須是靜態。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
